price: Kwani tuliwapa Kitabu kabla ya hichi, na ikawa wao wanakishikilia hicho?
arabic: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ فَهُم بِهِۦ مُسۡتَمۡسِكُونَ
footnotes: Kwani tuliwapa Kitabu kabla ya Qur'ani cha kuunga mkono huu uzushi wao, ndio maana wakashikamana nao kwa nguvu hivi? Hatukuwateremshia Kitabu namna hiyo. Basi hawana hoja ya kuinukulu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am ātaynāhum kitāban min qablihi fahum bihi mus'tamsikūna
